mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_DEL_GB, MEM_ADMIN, MEM_INFORM_AGREE, MEM_GRADE, MEM_PICKUP_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{MEM_EMAIL} AND MEM_DEL_GB = 'N'

SELECT BRAND_NUM, BRAND_ID, BRAND_PW, BRAND_NAME, BRAND_INFO, BRAND_BUSINESS_NUM, BRAND_ADD, BRAND_JOINDATE, BRAND_DEL_GB, BRAND_LOGO_FILE FROM BRAND WHERE BRAND_ID = #{BRAND_ID} AND BRAND_DEL_GB = 'N'

SELECT SHOP_NUM, SHOP_ID, SHOP_PW, SHOP_BRAND, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_TEL, SHOP_ADD, SHOP_POS1, SHOP_POS2, SHOP_DEL_GB, SHOP_START_TIME, SHOP_END_TIME FROM SHOP WHERE SHOP_ID = #{SHOP_ID} AND SHOP_DEL_GB = 'N'
SELECT MEM_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = #{MEM_NAME} AND to_char(MEM_PHONE)= #{MEM_PHONE} AND MEM_DEL_GB = 'N'
SELECT MEM_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = #{MEM_NAME} AND MEM_EMAIL = #{MEM_EMAIL} AND MEM_DEL_GB = 'N'
